turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I want to order about eight pizzas from Round Table.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Uh, ok. Which Round Table did you have in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That one near the food bank. Their having a special event, so I'm going to donate some pizza for the worker's lunch.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh cool, that sounds great! What types of pizza were you thinking of?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a variety. Maybe several of their specialties and a few plain ones?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about a couple of pepperoni pizzas, and some plain cheese ones? That will take care of the pickier eaters.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! So maybe two large pepperonis and two large cheese pizzas. That just leaves four others. I'd like something with pineapple at least, there has to be one person there that likes pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Their Maui Zaui has pineapple, and I can guarantee you it's delicious.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, we'll go with that. How about something with chicken for one of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Either their BBQ chicken or their chicken and garlic pizza is pretty good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The chicken and garlic sounds nice. Do they have a veggie pizza as well?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. Let me look it up really quick. Ok, there's one called Gourmet Veggie and another called Guinevere's Garden Delight.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome! Let's get one of each then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! Did you want to order anything else? Breadsticks, pop, dessert?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think some breadsticks would be nice. Do they have any interesting ones?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have some Garlic Parmesan Twists. Would you like those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Better make it about four orders.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! Let me go ahead and place the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic! Can they deliver it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hold on, let me check. Yes, they can, however it will take a lot longer.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's okay. The food bank director can pick it up. Make sure to let them know the director will be the one picking it up. Her name is Henrietta Hanger.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Give me one minute. Ok, the order's in. It should be ready for Henrietta to pick up in about 25 minutes. They'll text your receipt to your phone.
